channel.title: Do It - ST3R30
channel.description: My latest song, [Do It](https://soundcloud.com/thatguywhousesauxy/do-it). Feedback is, as always, appreciated.

item.title: Do It - ST3R30
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
Easy, just double the length of the melody and change one or two important notes in the last half of your phrase (use a note from the chord in that bar) and maybe then change rhythm of the end of an 8 bar loop. Then, come up with a counter melody. That is usually the hardest part, but you can cheat by using arpeggiated chords.

Read full topic

item.title: Do It - ST3R30
item.dc:creator: ST3R30
item.description:
thanks for the feedback, it totally helped! i do understand that it’s a bit repetitive, but sometimes it’s a bit hard to come up with a melody that isn’t super repetitive. again, thanks for the feedback

Read full topic

item.title: Do It - ST3R30
item.dc:creator: nep
item.description:
Well, I thought the song structure was good. I espeicially liked all of the variation and panning in the chorus/drop. The main thing is (and I hear this with a lot of other songs on this forum), in my opinion, too much melodic repitition. Only one variation of the melody is played constantly throughout the entire song. It makes it kind of droning to listen to.

Hope this helped.

P.S. Oh yea, and I also agree with Tropical_Madman about the cut. I thought it was the end of the song.

Read full topic

item.title: Do It - ST3R30
item.dc:creator: Tropical_Madman
item.description:
Great work! Love the drum set placement. It really fits the rhythm. The cut out kind of got me confused but so far this is amazing! Can’t wait to hear more!
